description: All the dialog lines for the wizard in the Number Guessing Game.

base.instructions: I'm thinking of a number between 1 and 100... Try and guess it!
base.tooLow: Try again. My number is higher than
base.tooHigh: Nope! My number is lower than
base.invalid: ... It needs to be a number between 1 and 100!
base.notANumber: Do you truly believe that's a number between 1 and 100?
